Alekhine resigns. The finish would be 36 K-R1 (or K-N1) R-K1, and mate follows on the back rank, unless Alekhine gives up his Rook with 37 R-Q1 QxR ch 38 K-R2, which would of course leave him hopelessly behind in material.
